author: Thiago Amin
title: Appending t-wl to subs
question:
Hey there!
I was just wondering if anyone could give me an explanation (like, essentially the logic behind it) on why sometimes the appropriate thing to do is
(append t-wl subs)
, where "subs" are the subs of a node in a tree
whereas sometimes the appropriate thing to do is
(append subs t-wl)
I have ran into this situation quite a few times: when I do them in one order, a few of my tests fail. But then when I change the order, they all pass.
instructor_answer: Please see @957.  After reading that please follow up if you still have a question.
